field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: You can switch between the different environments, by selecting the corresponding operation mode.

field.label: Test Mode
field.comment: You can switch between the different test modes.

field.label: User ID
field.comment: The user ID is provided by Open Payment Platform.

field.label: User Password
field.comment: The password is provided by Open Payment Platform.

field.label: Order prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert an order prefix. The prefix allows you to change the order number that is transmitted to Open Payment Platform . The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

field.label: Entity ID
field.comment: You receive an Entity ID when you create your Open Payment Platform account. The entity ID specified here will be taken, when no specific Entity ID is defined in the payment method settings.

field.label: Custom Parameters
field.comment: You can define custom parameters that are sent to the PSP with every request. Syntax: "customParameters[RISK_MID]=123123", one parameter per line.

field.label: Webhook Secret Key
field.comment: You can specify the secret key during the setup of the webhook.

field.label: Level
field.comment: Messages of this or a higher level will be logged.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Open Payment Platform in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Payment Methods
field.comment: Define the payment methods, the customer can choose from. List them separated by a space.

field.label: Entity ID
field.comment: The Entity ID is a unique key for the identification of the unit which sends transactions into the system.

field.label: Channel Conditions
field.comment: Beside the default channel id a set of channel ids depending on the order total amount can be defined. Each line must contain a lower amount, an upper amount and the applicable channel id. The format is as follow 'lower amount;upper amount;channel id'. The following example shows a conrete on: '10.00;200.00;23413113213131231353' The upper boundaries are not included. If you leave this field empty or if a amount is outside any range the default channel id is applied. If multiple conditions match, the last one is taken.

field.label: Entity ID (MoTo)
field.comment: If this payment method should support recurring and moto transactions, you have to specify a second entity ID without 3d secure.

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)? If instructed to do so you can also choose the risk based capturing. But please note that this feature can only be used if your account has the option activated. Contact your service provider for more information.

field.label: COPYandPAY Style
field.comment: Define the style to be used for the COPYandPAY payment form.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Open Payment Platform.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Open Payment Platform in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

If you leave this field empty or if a amount is outside any range the default channel id is applied. If multiple conditions match, the last one is taken.

If instructed to do so you can also choose the risk based capturing. But please note that this feature can only be used if your account has the option activated. Contact your service provider for more information.

Each line must contain a lower amount, an upper amount and the applicable channel id. The format is as follow 'lower amount;upper amount;channel id'. The following example shows a conrete on: '10.00;200.00;23413113213131231353' The upper boundaries are not included. If you leave this field empty or if a amount is outside any range the default channel id is applied. If multiple conditions match, the last one is taken.

field.label: Entity ID (MoTo)
field.comment: If this payment method should support recurring and moto transactions, you have to specify a second entity ID without 3d secure.

field.label: COPYandPAY Style
field.comment: Define the style to be used for the COPYandPAY payment form.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Open Payment Platform in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Entity ID
field.comment: The Entity ID is a unique key for the identification of the unit which sends transactions into the system.

field.label: Channel Conditions
field.comment: Beside the default channel id a set of channel ids depending on the order total amount can be defined. Each line must contain a lower amount, an upper amount and the applicable channel id. The format is as follow 'lower amount;upper amount;channel id'. The following example shows a conrete on: '10.00;200.00;23413113213131231353' The upper boundaries are not included. If you leave this field empty or if a amount is outside any range the default channel id is applied. If multiple conditions match, the last one is taken.

field.label: Entity ID (MoTo)
field.comment: If this payment method should support recurring and moto transactions, you have to specify a second entity ID without 3d secure.

field.label: COPYandPAY Style
field.comment: Define the style to be used for the COPYandPAY payment form.

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)? If instructed to do so you can also choose the risk based capturing. But please note that this feature can only be used if your account has the option activated. Contact your service provider for more information.

field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Open Payment Platform.
